title: WeWow Back to School - Day 1: Constructing Creativity!
description:
It's Back to School week at WeWow! This week, we'll listen to some of your favorite episodes of Wow in the World and give you tinkering challenges to try at home. Today, we're listening to "Constructing Creativity: How Science and Art Aren't So Far Apart" and building towers with cups and popsicle sticks! Grownups, share photos of your Wowzer's towers with us at tinkercast.com/share. Head over to the WeWow podcast feed to tune in for new challenges all week long!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
